callStartNewGame() - Method in class gamePackage.UserInterface
Function to start a new game.
Card - Class in gamePackage
The Card class represents a playing card with a suit, a title, a value in the game of blackjack an ID number and a status of if its in the deck.
Card(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class gamePackage.Card
Constructor for objects of class Card
checkBustStood() - Method in class gamePackage.Game
Checks to see if any of the players have bust, stood, or won.
closeUI() - Method in class gamePackage.UserInterface
Function to close the current user interface.
Computer - Class in gamePackage
The Computer class represents a player that is a computer player.
Computer(String) - Constructor for class gamePackage.Computer
Constructor for objects of sub-class Computer
computerCardReveal(Player, Game) - Method in class gamePackage.UserInterface
Function to redraw all of the computer's cards the right way up, which is called when the game is over, to let the player see what cards the computer had.
computerStatusMessage(String, Player) - Method in class gamePackage.UserInterface
Function to show a message under the computer's hand of cards, showing status of what the computer is doing (such as 'making a choice' or 'drawing another card').
computerStoodMessage(Player, String) - Method in class gamePackage.UserInterface
Function to display a message next to a computer's name if they have chosen to "stand".
computerTotalMessage(String, Player) - Method in class gamePackage.UserInterface
Function to show a message telling the computer's total hand value.
